utils.custom_error¶

utils.custom_error(arr: ndarray, **kwargs) → ndarray¶
Parameters:
arr: np.ndarray

array of the values you want to calculate the average

kwargs: additional keyword arguments for np.mean
Returns:
np.ndarray
